imdb.title: Sorcerous Stabber Orphen
imdb.plot: A sorcerer who was once the top student of the famous Tower of Fang, now spends his time chasing around his hopeless clients as a moneylender, at least until his client comes up with a plan to make money: marriage fraud.

episodes.title: A Vestige of the Past
episodes.plot: Orphen is searching for his friend Azalie after she had disappeared five years ago. He's currently trying to pay off his debt at the inn he's staying at when two dwarves named Volkan and Dortin tell him they have a sweet plan to get him out of debt.

episodes.title: The Tower of Fangs
episodes.plot: Orphen, Volkan, and Dortin are captured by the authorities after the fiasco with the monster that appeared. Orphen is then summoned by Heartia to go talk to his former master, Childman.

episodes.title: Heed My Call, Beast
episodes.plot: Orphen goes with Childman and the other Black Sorcerers in order to try to track down Azalie before they can kill her. He manages to track down the creature, and despite his best efforts to talk to her, the creature attacks.

episodes.title: The Chaos Witch and the Successor of the Razor's Edge
episodes.plot: Orphen remembers more of his past at the Tower of Fangs and a time when he and Azalie ventured back to the orphanage where they grew up. Back in present time, Orphen finds a couple of stowaways.

episodes.title: Deep Dragon
episodes.plot: Orphen, Claiomh, and Majic try to get through Fenrir's Forest to get to Tafrem. However, Majic ends up lost in the forest and runs into a mysterious girl.

episodes.title: Forest Maiden
episodes.plot: After Orphen is attacked by the Deep Dragon, he wakes up in a cell unsure of where he is or who he is for a moment. A girl then appears before him, and offers to heal his wounds and eventually, his memories return.

episodes.title: GATHER IN MY FOREST, WOLVES
episodes.plot: Orphen tries to stop MacDougal from going into the Dragon's sanctuary. The Deep Dragon attacks the village for attempting to go into the Dragon's sanctuary and Orphen tries to save the villagers.

episodes.title: An Unexpected Assassin
episodes.plot: An assassin is killing one elder after another. Forte and Leticia try to find out who's behind the murders. Meanwhile, the assassin shows himself before Orphen and he's shocked to see that they have the same face as him.

episodes.title: Ghost from the Past
episodes.plot: Leticia and Orphen try to figure out who the assassin actually is. Is Orphen who he thinks he is, or is the assassin calling himself Krylancelo his true self?

episodes.title: Make My Past Disappear, Assassin
episodes.plot: Claiomh is kidnapped by the assassin, and Orphen faces off with the assassin that calls himself Krylancelo once and for all in order to save her.

episodes.title: The Uoar Class
episodes.plot: Claiomh tries to cook some food to nurse Orphen back to health, but it might be doing more harm than good. Orphen and Leticia take Majic to the Tower of Fangs so he can enroll.

episodes.title: Death Keening
episodes.plot: Tish ends up following one of the assassins so that Orphen wouldn't have to deal with them and ends up getting hurt. Orphen plans to get revenge, but gets help from an unlikely source.

episodes.title: Come to My Tower, Successor
episodes.plot: Orphen, Claiomh, and Majic head to the Tower of Fangs to settle things with the Uoar Class once and for all.

episodes.title: Special: Celestial Artifacts
episodes.plot: Azalie recalls the time she and Childman found the Sword of Baldanders and Orphen gets ready to leave for Kimluck.
